Always-on care

Remote monitoring, predictive maintenance, and playbooks for facility teams to run confidently.

Engagement blueprint

What collaboration with A&B Innovation feels like.

Step 1

Site pulse

Laser scans, electrical audits, and user interviews to model a living brief.

Step 2

Co-create

Experience boards, bill of quantities, and live demos so you see the future state.

Step 3

Deploy

Clean-room installation standards with daily reports, drone visuals, and QA sheets.

Step 4

Support

24/7 monitoring, response teams, and quarterly optimization workshops.

Service terms

Transparent logistics & installation policy

Payment policy: Pay after receiving standard products. For delivery + installation, settle 50% before dispatch and the remaining 50% once installation is completed. Installations outside Kigali can be negotiated.

Delivery: Free within Kigali. Outside Kigali, delivery terms are negotiable based on destination.

Installation-only: If you prefer A&B Innovation to install equipment you already have on site, services are available and priced on a negotiated rate.
